attributes.action: Introduce legislation in England to prevent parents smacking their children
attributes.background: Scotland recently agreed legislation to prevent parents using physical punishment on their children, England should do the same to recognise the rights of children in line with the United Nations Convention on Children’s Rights, they should have the right to live without fear of physical violence

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559501
